Headline: Loop-bound Brown & Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown & Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Armitage. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown and Purple Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier signal problems near Armitage.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near Broadway/Dakin
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted NB: Broadway, Clarendon, Irving Park & Broadway; SB: Broadway, Irving Park, Fremont, West Sheridan & Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Broadway/Dakin.

Northbound buses will operate via Broadway, Clarendon, Irving Park and Broadway.

Southbound buses will operate via Broadway, Irving Park, Fremont, West Sheridan and Broadway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near Broadway/Dakin
ShortDescription: WB 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Lake Shore Dr, West Sheridan, Broadway, Clarendon & Irving Pk: due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Lake Shore Drive, West Sheridan, Broadway, Clarendon and Irving Park: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Dakin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
